meanings.definition: The son of a czar in Russia.
meanings.sent1: The czarevich played with his toy soldiers in the palace.
meanings.sent2: The czarevich inherited the crown after his father's passing.
meanings.sent3: The czarevich tried to ride a bear in the royal garden, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: The czarevich's presence in the court was like a shining star in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The image of the czarevich in his golden robes was etched in everyone's memory.

meanings.definition: A title given to the heir apparent to the Russian throne.
meanings.sent1: As the czarevich, he was next in line to rule the vast Russian empire.
meanings.sent2: The czarevich's portrait was displayed proudly in the grand hall of the palace.
meanings.sent3: During the ceremony, the czarevich tripped on his own robe, causing a moment of lightheartedness.
meanings.sent4: The responsibility of being the czarevich weighed heavily on his young shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The people cheered for the czarevich, their future leader, with unwavering loyalty.
